text: 26.65: Mk 14.63 naŋga, Sɨ 14.1426.65-66: Wkp 24.16Jisas kamavahi, Gotɨŋ kɨrañɨŋguhundu aru miku haŋɨnɨŋɨndu aru miku hama kandɨhuyu ha indarɨta, aka yahamɨrata nuŋandɨ mɨkwɨrɨ haŋɨnɨŋ mɨŋasɨhɨrata ambami, Gotɨŋ ambasuvi. Harɨm narɨ naŋga sɨhinda kru kanɨmandu vanarɨm ambavaravararɨm kru muvɨraŋ ambɨtɨrɨŋ mambayɨmu. Tɨhura Gotɨŋ ambasuvahi indarɨra.
